item.title: Adding Metafields to Product Variants - Dawn Theme
item.description: By using metafields we can store extra information on products, collections, customers, orders, blogs, pages and your shop. Then, you can use the metafield object to display the information on you website pages using simple Liquid code. Adding custom Metafields is now built into Shopify. It can be accessed via Settings -> Metafields in your Dashboard (currently, you can only add metafields to Products and Variants with this method; Collections, Customers and Orders will be added soon).
